title: Dungeon Crawler Ambience & Soundscapes
description: This pack contains high-quality music and soundscapes for your dungeon crawler game creations! 5 deep and immersive drones, with 12 atmospheric soundscapes. All tracks are perfect seamless loops that will match any duration needed.
longDescription:
Perfect loops to set the mood in your dungeon crawler game, or any game where dungeons or caves are included. This pack contains 5 tonal ambient drones and 12 soundscapes. Of the 12 soundscapes provided, 5 are exclusive to this pack and 7 were taken from our Medieval Fantasy RPG Game: Ambience and Soundscapes pack.


Hear the sounds on our SoundCloud page HERE:

All Files Included List


  • We appreciate hearing from our buyers and value your feedback! Leaving a review, providing suggestions, or reaching out to us directly helps us understand your needs and preferences better. As authors, we genuinely enjoy interacting with the developers who use our product.


Thank you,

Cyberwave Orchestra

cyberwaveorchestra@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Mastered to -1 dB, with no clicks, no distortion, just pure quality. Seamless looping. As for all loops in general, we recommend starting loops with a slight fade-in, as this makes it smoother when they first start. Later when they loop they don't need to fade in.

Number of Audio Waves: 17

Number of Audio Cues: 17

Format: 16-bit, 44.1 kHz Stereo Wav

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 25:18 min

Supported Development Platforms: All
